description:
This is a great app if you want to do a small scale 'zero trust' network where you use TLS/SSL even for your LAN and internal only self hosted services.

If a full blown PKI system is overkill, but you still want SSL/TLS certificates on internal machines (so no Let's Encrypt/ACME) this is a nice GUI that let's you do create the certificates you need.
summary: Great for easier TLS/SSL on internal networks

description: It works for my elster.de usecase
